attributes.action: Treat England the same way as Wales and Scotland over Prescription, Care for the Elderly & NHS car parking charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are Wales and Scotland being allowed to 'opt out' of paying fees for important areas that effect all of us such as presecriptions, care for the elderly and nhs car parking charges, when it is the UK government (me and you!)who will ultimately have to pay for any shortfalls they may suffer to their budgets? I believe these items should be free but they should be free for us ALL.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
